Reviews.Title: Amazing! Great app that permits you to see your camera screen on smartphone
Reviews.Author: Humberto Jose Garza
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera, has WIFI and iphone app that permits you to see your camera screen on your iphone! You can take pictures from your iphone and set timer, change it to manual, set flash etc all from the app.  Highly recommended. In love with this color and model. First model that permits you to take video too. Every penny is worth it!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Holly F.
Reviews.Content: Great pictures..very good Lenes and a real camera of class!Wouldn't hesitate to buy more as presents and one for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
Leica DC Vario-Summicron f/2-5.9 (at maximum wideangle and telephoto settings)/ 6-42.8 mm ASPH. (35 mm camera equivalent: 28-200 mm)
1/1.7" MOS sensor. Primary color filter. Total pixel number: 12,800.000. Effective pixels: 12,100.000
WiFi / NFC, image back up and camera operation with Android and iOS smartphones
Full HD Video
Built-in electronical viewfinder (200,000 Pixel)
Leica DC Vario-Summicron 6-42.8 mm f/2-5.9 ASPH (28-200 mm 35 equiv)
12 MP 1/1,7″ sensor
Dimensions (W x H x D) Approx. 103 x 63 x 28 mm / 4.06 x 2.48 x 1.10 in (lens retracted).
Weight Ca. 173/195 g / 6.1/6.9 oz (withou/with card and battery).
Scope of delivery Camera body, battery charger/AC adapter (Leica ACA-DC11), rechargeable battery (Leica BP-DC14), wrist strap, AV cable, USB cable, CD with long instructions (PDF) , short instructions, Guarantee Card .
Flash Built-in.
Digital zoom Max. 4 x.
ProductInfo.Name: Leica C Typ112 Compact Digital Camera, Light Gold
